EmailTemplate.name: 17-BG-SSE-Email-SSE SBC prod nurture2-T0025N.SSE_SBC_4_Miercom_Report
EmailTemplate.subject: SBC: Miercom weighs in on who’s best
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Miercom Report Guess who set benchmarks in performance testing? The results are in. After completing independent performance and function validation testing, the cloud-based Nokia Session Border Controller (SBC) has earned the prestigious Miercom Performance Certified certification – setting the benchmark for performance and security in fixed, cable and mobile networks.
In this Miercom report, take a deeper dive into the findings, including how Nokia SBC has demonstrated:
- Complete mitigation of Distributed Denial of Service (DDoS) attacks without degradation in performance - High resiliency in failover tests with 100% successful handover of established calls - Highest per-VNF capacity for software-based media and signaling Enjoy! Brendan Ziolo Head of Secure Service Enablement, Nokia Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia’s networks business or its third-party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
